p: A total of five flavonoids were detected, with two of them showing a significant substrate effect in their concentrations (Table 6). For both apigenin (DF = 2; F = 6.78; R 2 = 0.492; p = 0.0087) and kaempferol (DF = 2; F = 5.40; R 2 = 0.454; p = 0.0196) lower concentrations were recorded in KW fed BSFL as compared to the other substrates.
